title: Best of The Herd for May 07, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 07, 2020
description:
Adam Silver is starting to look weak in his attempts to bring back the NBA

History is telling you that Joe Burrow will struggle in Cincinnati 

Colin doesn't want Alex Smith to play football again

NFL playoff predictions


Guests: Steve Smith Sr, former Panthers & Ravens WR

Michael Lewis, Author of 'The Big Short' and 'Moneyball'

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
